comments.body: I think you should do a thorough research about a casino before you throwing your money into them, not even single dime. There are also a lot of other functional and trustworthy online casinos which is also tested with lots of positive remarks that you can try with also lots of bonuses and incitives.One thing you should know is that, everyone is not the same and no one should be trusted on this internet space a d you should try searching for reputable casinos in the forum.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I really wish folks would do some research before posting here asking about a casino. Google is your friend. Things like this make me feel like a site is trying to create a discussion about their product without claiming they are the owner.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: SanyaFT9 on December 14, 2022, 03:48:55 PMHas anyone played at this casino www.dexterbet.com ? Share reviews about them who have dealt with them or maybe someone knows a good casino with identical odds to their sportbook. ThankI had never heard about this casino around here, OP. So I can't let you know my opinion.However, I would like to tell you not to judge a casino mostly because their odds, there are some reputable casinos around here with a long history serving people and withdrawals which have acceptable odds (some better than others). I have read some shady casinos may even use over-the-average odds to attract people, but it is not worth to risk your money that way, better safe than sorry.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: SanyaFT9 on December 14, 2022, 03:48:55 PMHas anyone played at this casino www.dexterbet.com ? Share reviews about them who have dealt with them or maybe someone knows a good casino with identical odds to their sportbook. ThankThis sounds more of an advertisement though. Seems you are good at that.  I suggest you do your own research properly before getting involved in any form of investment or deal with them. Research about the casino on their website, know their terms and conditions which should be the first thing you do before dealing with them, know their legal jurisdiction if it is ok to get involved with people from your location or nation. Never the less, I have not come across such casino onboard this platform. That name Sounds strange though but a quick review on the site shows their policies to be a bit favourable to customers and bettors. The graphics is quite appealing with a good user interface. From the looks, the casino seems to be a new one in the industry. If I am not mistaken, you happen to be the first person making a post and thread about them. My thoughts.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: The casino seems to have been operating for a while, but there is not much information available about it. The casino.guru review site rates this casino with a rating of 6.1 (out of 10) and "Questionable reputation". There is also one open complaint directly about Dexterbet Casino: https://casino.guru/dexterbet-casino-player-believes-that-their-withdrawalThe best advice for any casino player is to always do your research before depositing any money. I wouldn't risk gambling at such an obscure casino when there are plenty of better options available.
